name: Wiggle Arms Space Force
description:
OH NO
THE MACHINE IS IN DANGER!!!

Wiggle ranger!!!  You're the only one who can save it!!!
Use the machine to make guns and fend off the waves of bugs!

Made for Ludum Dare 50
By sirmilkman :)
Music by James Evans!!

The mousewheel is a bit funky in browser so you can download if you want.
You can also do q and e i guess
